work.summary: Docker is an open platform for developers and sysadmins to build, ship, and run distributed applications.
highlights: Built the infrastructure for Docker's SaaS offerings from scratch
Contributed to the Docker open source project, e.g TLS authentication
Built various tools to support operation of the platform
Gave talks about Docker on various occasions

work.summary: SoundCloud is the world's leading social sound platform where anyone can create sounds and share them everywhere.
highlights: Designed multi zone and multi datacenter infrastructure, service naming and discovery including locality awareness
Wrote guidelines for configuration and system management
Contributed to internal cluster scheduler and monitoring systems / time series database 'prometheus' written in Go.

work.summary: Strato is a internet service provider and Europe's second-largest web-hosting company.
highlights: Leading projects like hardware evaluation, IPv6 deployment and development of APS-Installer.
Implemented various automation and end-to-end backup checking.

work.summary: VR Netze, now merged with ratiodata, provides network services to the cooperative banking sector.
highlights: Operated, scaled and redesigned DNS and DHCP infrastructure for GAD's banking associations.
Responsible for name resolution and IP configuration for more than 150,000 systems.
Redesigned domain namespace in use by more than 500 financial institutes.
Automated infrastructure configuration and implementation of web and 3rd party interfaces.
Design and implementation of highly available DNS.
